# Overview

This REST API was entirely developed using DeepSeek AI as the primary development tool. Here's an overview of the development process:

### Development Approach

* **AI-Assisted Development**: The entire codebase was initially generated by DeepSeek AI

* **Code Review & Debugging**: I performed comprehensive code review and fixed runtime issues

* **Testing**: Unit tests for the ProductosController class were AI-generated and validated

* **Personal Oversight**: While AI generated the initial implementation, I maintained full architectural oversight and quality control

### Project Context

This represents my first experience building a complete API primarily through AI collaboration. My typical development workflow involves:

* Defining project architecture and structure

* Using AI for specific tasks like:

  * Syntax clarification
  * Code quality improvements
  * Issue resolution and debugging
  * Test generation

### Data Storage Configuration

**Important Note**: This implementation uses a JSON file for initial data loading. Please be aware that:

* All data persists only during application runtime

* Any data created or modified will be lost when the application stops

* This is ideal for development and testing purposes

## DeepSeek conversation

This time I decided to chat with DeepSeek in Spanish. I use to chat in English to get better responses.

[Go to chat](https://chat.deepseek.com/share/9xkwlh1uds16sa9zlk)

## Key Features
✅ SOLID principles

✅ REST Best practices

✅ Design patterns


### Curls
#### Listar
```
curl --location 'http://localhost:8080/api/v1/productos'
```
#### Listar por categoría
```
curl --location 'http://localhost:8080/api/v1/productos/categoria/tecnologia'
```
#### Listar por id
```
curl --location 'http://localhost:8080/api/v1/productos/1
```
#### Buscar por nombre
```
curl --location 'http://localhost:8080/api/v1/productos/buscar?nombre=lenovo'
```
#### Crear
```
curl --location 'http://localhost:8080/api/v1/productos' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--data '{
    "nombre": "Lenovo Yoga Slim",
    "descripcion": "Laptop para movilidad y productividad",
    "precio": 1300,
    "categoria": "Tecnologia",
    "stock": 15,
    "disponible": true
}'
```
#### Actualizar
```
curl --location 'http://localhost:8080/api/v1/productos/buscar?nombre=lenovo'curl --location --request PUT 'http://localhost:8080/api/v1/productos/1000' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--data '{
    "nombre": "Lenovo Yoga Slim Snapdragon X Elite",
    "descripcion": "Laptop para movilidad y productividad",
    "precio": 1350,
    "categoria": "Tecnologia",
    "stock": 15,
    "disponible": true
}'
```
#### Eliminar
```
curl --location --request DELETE 'http://localhost:8080/api/v1/productos/1000'
```
